message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique product for $1400000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you is $1200000. I'm looking forward to hearing your thoughts!
I appreciate your time and consideration. I'm willing to pay $1100000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.

I understand that you're looking to make a deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1100000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1300000. This is my final counteroffer, and I'm confident it's a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I'm still interested in purchasing the product, but I'm not willing to go above $1100000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.
